biases.headline: The Suokan embassy in Zuania dissapears from one day to the next
biases.text: Seemingly from one day to another, the suokan embassy has been sold and turned into a school. The government of Suoka has not made any public statement about it, however all of the diplomats and ex-pats in Zuania have returned home or been reallocated to other countries.

biases.headline: The Suokan embassy in Zuania dissapears from one day to the next
biases.text: In a sign of rising tensions, the suokan embassy has been sold and turned into a school. The government of Suoka has not made any public statement about it, however all of the diplomats and ex-pats in Zuania have returned home or been reallocated to other countries.

biases.headline: Zuania in peril
biases.text: In a sign of rising tensions, the suokan embassy has repurposed and it empty. The government of Suoka has refused to make any public statement. Unsurprisingly all of the diplomats and ex-pats in Zuania have returned home or been reallocated to other countries.
